data.title: Lifestyle
data.meta_description: Whether you need design support, electric manufacturing services or technology expertise, Flex can help. Let's get your product to the market faster.
data.text:
Enabling lifestyle products that deliver seamless and connected user experiences

As a global leader in design and manufacturing of smart and connected devices, Flex builds products that enhance the way we live. Our vertically integrated centers of excellence offer world-class technical expertise in electronics, metals, plastics, and components. At the same time, our state-of-the-art logistics system enables sustainability and better circularity in your business model, helping you bring products to market faster and more cost-effectively.

Global manufacturing services

Flex offers global production infrastructure with end-to-end expertise and both global and regional manufacturing capabilities. We have operations sites in 30 countries worldwide, including locations in the Americas, Europe, and Asia Pacific.

Explore our manufacturing capabilities

Product design and development

Our top-level services include product design and engineering, prototyping, new product introduction, test development, certification and regulatory testing, and sustaining engineering. Our centers are well-equipped with the people and technologies to deliver durable, smart and connected, and visually appealing products to market.

View our design and engineering services

Supply chain and logistics support

Flex is a trusted partner for companies looking to create a resilient supply chain in the face of uncertain times. With over 4,000 global suppliers to work with, our supply chain experts leverage digital tools and data to evaluate, manage, and make informed decisions on the shifting supply chain landscape so you can focus on your business.

Learn about our trusted supply chain

Circular economy sustainability programs

Achieve your ESG goals with sustainable business practices and circular economy solutions to streamline end-of-life and reuse. We can help with reverse logistics, returns, screening, repair, recycling, refurbishment, warranty managing, and re-work.

Discover our circular economy solutions

Floor care

We enable cleaner residential and commercial floors with design and manufacturing of upright, stick, deep clean, and robotic vacuums.

Learn more

Appliances

We manufacture a wide range of home and commercial appliances such as large, small, and personal care.

Learn more

Audio

We enable companies to design and manufacture premium audio devices from headphones, speakers, and soundbars to video conferencing and home automation control systems.

Learn more

Smart living

We help customers deliver advanced home living products, including home monitoring and safety, fitness, smart mobility, power tools, and retail and convenience.

Learn more

Tap into the demand for high-end floor care

We offer a global manufacturing and logistics system with dedicated floor care sites supported by tailor-made supply chains comprised of critical floor care components, including motors, packaging, and plastics. We build products with the quality and reliability your customers demand.

Leverage our expertise and product launch services to get to market faster with advanced vertically integrated capabilities and our suite of technology building blocks in electronic controls, sensors, connectivity, and human-machine interface (HMI). Get the visibility you need to efficiently manage your floor care product supply with our state-of-art digital tools and data systems.

Our floor care services

Reduce design and manufacturing complexity with our bundled services including tooling, plastics, electronics, battery packs, and full product assembly.

End markets we manufacture:

Robotic

Upright

Stick

Wet dry

Intelligent, connected appliances for a premium user experience

We build large, small, and personal care appliances that incorporate the latest technologies, making them both smart and intuitive. Our experienced team of experts use advanced materials, processes, and techniques to help your products stand out from the rest. Moreover, our robust supply chain ensures that your appliances are manufactured with sustainability in mind, making sure that we are doing what is best for people and the planet.

Large appliances

Bring life to your large appliances with seamless, connected user interfaces. Leverage our vertically integrated manufacturing system to efficiently deliver intuitive and aesthetically pleasing controls for your appliances.

End markets we manufacture:

Home laundry

Refrigerators

Dishwashers

Large cooking

HVAC

Small appliances

From beverage to cooking systems, we offer one-stop solutions to build and assemble small appliances. Our experience with intelligent dispensing can help you meet unique needs for feature, form, and regulatory requirements.

End markets we manufacture:

Small cooking appliances

Beverage dispensing

Food preparation

Personal care appliances

We manufacture award-winning, visually stunning, and highly innovative personal care products that offer an exceptional user experience. Our Center of Excellence provides high-end finishing capabilities, integrated technology, and optimized battery efficiency.

End markets we manufacture:

Oral care devices

Skin care, cleansing devices, laser rejuvenation, and light therapy

Hair dryers, straighteners, curlers, and trimmers

Wearables, scales, smart mirrors, and hydration
